timeline.message: Make mojo send only specified data, and make it all optional
Make ApplicationVersion id depend on number and commit, and make revision optional

timeline.author: freva
freva

replies.bodyText: But is it only used internally or is it possible to get this as response to some job? (I know that at least in the past deployments to dev did not have build number)
replies.author: freva

replies.bodyText: They explicitly use the empty one.
replies.author: jonmv

replies.bodyText: Would be nice to have something we can use to consistently refer to builds in console
replies.author: freva

timeline.author: freva

replies.bodyText: Hmm... Yes, for the explicitly passed sourceUrl, I guess that makes sense. I don't dare do it for the generated ones :)
replies.author: jonmv

replies.bodyText: URI.create() is a start, but unfortunately it allows relative URLs or just the path component
replies.author: freva
